plot: The Wardenriech begin to wrap up and withdraw from the devastated Soul Society however are stopped by Ichigo, who finally arrives at the scene. He has one last chance at vengeance with a showdown against Yhwach.

Following the confrontation between Captain-Commander Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto and the Quincy King, Substitute Soul Reaper Kurosaki Ichigo enters the battlefield, as Soul Society is on the verge of collapsing. Everything falls now on his shoulders.—Cryph
